short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Understand your streaming use & get personalized show/movie recs weekly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamy is a free chrome extension that looks across your streaming platform usage to reveal:

1. What shows and movies you’re watching,
2. How you’re watching, and
3. Recommended shows and movies that you should be watching based off your streaming history

Streaming metrics include:
· Your top genres by minutes watched (You really love horror movies...spooky)
· Personalized show and movie recommendations, updated each Monday (Making Mondays that much better)
· Time spent streaming per month (January was one long Breaking Bad marathon)
· Average hours spent per day of week (Tuesdays are for streaming)
· Total titles watched (I’m a professional TV watcher)
· Total time spent on series (Where does the time go?)
· Total time spent on movies (Movie buff coming through)
· And more!

*Streamy currently covers Netflix viewing only.

Streamy takes privacy seriously. Please see our Privacy Policy here (https://www.streamystats.com/privacy) for more information.
long.es:
Your streaming behavior, revealed!

Streamy is a free chrome extension that looks across your streaming platform usage to reveal:

1. What shows and movies you’re watching,
2. How you’re watching, and
3. Recommended shows and movies that you should be watching based off your streaming history

Streaming metrics include:
· Your top genres by minutes watched (You really love horror movies...spooky)
· Personalized show and movie recommendations, updated each Monday (Making Mondays that much better)
· Time spent streaming per month (January was one long Breaking Bad marathon)
· Average hours spent per day of week (Tuesdays are for streaming)
· Total titles watched (I’m a professional TV watcher)
· Total time spent on series (Where does the time go?)
· Total time spent on movies (Movie buff coming through)
· And more!

*Streamy currently covers Netflix viewing only.

Streamy takes privacy seriously. Please see our Privacy Policy here (https://www.streamystats.com/privacy) for more information.
